snippet: In a scathing critique of Arizona’s criminal justice system, a state appeals court Thursday ordered the dismissal of murder charges against a woman who spent 22 years on death row.
abstract: Arizona Court of Appeals orders dismissal of murder charges against Debra Jean Milke, woman who has spent 22 years on death row in her son's killing; decision amounts to blistering critique of state's criminal justice system.
lead_paragraph: In a scathing critique of Arizona’s criminal justice system, a state appeals court Thursday ordered the dismissal of murder charges against a woman who spent 22 years on death row.

headline.main: Arizona: No Retrial for Woman Freed From Death Row
headline.print_headline: Arizona: No Retrial for Woman Freed From Death Row
